QuestData.Title: The Battle of Alterac
QuestData.Description: The Explorers' League believes there are artifacts in Alterac Valley, but the Frostwolf orcs won't let us explore. We can't allow the Horde to stop our scholarly pursuits! Defeat the Frostwolf general, Drek'Thar. With him dead, the orcs will lose their edge.$B$BDrek'Thar is in Frostwolf Keep, in the south of Alterac Valley. Vanquish him, and then return to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter Alterac Valley, defeat the Horde general Drek'thar, and then return to Prospector Stonehewer in the Alterac Mountains.
QuestData.CompletionText: Go, $N. Go to Alterac Valley and defeat the orc general!
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $N! With the Horde's nose bloodied after the death of their general, we'll have the breathing room we need to explore!
